alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Haskell; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 2:24AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Haskell, northern Callahan, Jones, Shackelford, northern Taylor and Throckmorton Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 222 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Knox City to Merkel. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... O`brien around 225 AM CDT. Hawley and Weinert around 235 AM CDT. Abilene around 250 AM CDT. Millers Creek Reservoir and Hamby around 255 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Funston, Impact, Tuxedo, Lake Fort Phantom Hill. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 265 and 307. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Callahan; Haskell; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor; Throckmorton
